_description: PDET context enrichment for DIM03 focusing on product definition, deliverable specification, and output measurement in PDET municipalities

gate_1_scope.justification: DIM03 requires access to PDET deliverable specifications, PATR output targets, and implementation monitoring data

gate_2_value_add.justification: Provides clear output standards and measurement criteria specific to PDET implementation context

gate_3_capability.justification: Methods must extract product specifications, validate measurement units, and assess quantitative targets

product_requirements: Km of roads constructed/improved (with technical specifications)
Number of households with energy access
Bridges and culverts constructed (units and specifications)
Students with educational materials (number and type)
School feeding programs established (number of beneficiaries)

product_specification_rigor.justification: PDET monitoring requires precise, verifiable product definitions for accountability

patr_output_consistency.justification: Municipal products must be consistent with PATR regional outputs to ensure coherence

territorial_disaggregation.justification: Territorial specificity enables monitoring of rural-urban equity and vereda-level accountability

measurement_feasibility.justification: Weak institutional capacity in PDET municipalities requires explicit measurement protocols

beneficiary_quantification.justification: PDET differential approach requires beneficiary disaggregation for equity monitoring

gap_1_vague_deliverables.description: Products described as 'strengthen', 'improve', 'promote' without quantifiable outputs
gap_1_vague_deliverables.impact: Impossible to monitor implementation; no accountability
gap_1_vague_deliverables.remediation: Mandate concrete, countable products with measurement units

gap_2_no_baselines.description: Product targets set without reference to current state
gap_2_no_baselines.impact: Cannot assess actual progress; targets may be already met or unrealistic
gap_2_no_baselines.remediation: Require baseline values for all product indicators

gap_3_aggregated_targets.description: Products specified only at municipal level without territorial breakdown
gap_3_aggregated_targets.remediation: Demand vereda-level or at minimum urban/rural product targets
